queryCondition.queryText:
CrowdStrikeDetections
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where Tactic == "Execution" or Technique has "T1204"
| where SeverityName in ("High", "Critical")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    Name,
    Description,
    SeverityName,
    Tactic,
    Technique,
    UserName,
    SourceAccountUpn,
    Filename,
    Filepath,
    Sha256,
    Md5,
    Cmdline,
    Device
| extend
    AccountUpn = SourceAccountUpn,
    DeviceName = tostring(Device.hostname),
    ReportId = tostring(hash_sha256(strcat(tostring(TimeGenerated), Name, tostring(Device.hostname))))

alertTemplate.title: PoCaaS Stage 2 Malicious payload execution detected by CrowdStrike
alertTemplate.description: CrowdStrike detected a high or critical severity execution event on an endpoint. Stage 2 of the PoCaaS attack chain (T1204.002).

displayName: PoCaaS Stage 3.5 Internal Port Scan Detected (Palo Alto)

queryCondition.queryText:
CommonSecurityLog
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where DeviceVendor == "Palo Alto Networks"
| where DeviceEventClassID == "TRAFFIC"
| where Activity in ("drop", "deny", "end")
| where ApplicationProtocol == "incomplete"
| summarize
    DistinctPorts = dcount(DestinationPort),
    DistinctHosts = dcount(DestinationIP),
    SessionCount = count(),
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    SourceHostName = take_any(SourceHostName)
    by SourceIP, SourceUserName
| where DistinctPorts > 20
| extend
    TimeGenerated = FirstSeen,
    AccountUpn = SourceUserName,
    DeviceName = SourceHostName,
    ReportId = tostring(hash_sha256(strcat(SourceIP, SourceUserName, tostring(DistinctPorts))))

alertTemplate.title: PoCaaS Stage 3.5 - Internal port scan detected via Palo Alto
alertTemplate.description: A host scanned more than 20 distinct ports across internal hosts, indicating network reconnaissance. Stage 3.5 of the PoCaaS attack chain (T1046).

displayName: PoCaaS Stage 4 Suspicious Okta Login + Privilege Escalation

queryCondition.queryText:
let login_events = OktaV2_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where EventOriginalType == "user.session.start"
| where OriginalOutcomeResult == "SUCCESS"
| where SrcGeoCountry != "US"
| project LoginTime = TimeGenerated, ActorUsername, SrcIpAddr, SrcGeoCountry, SrcGeoCity, ActorSessionId;
let priv_events = OktaV2_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where EventOriginalType in ("user.account.privilege.grant", "system.api_token.create", "user.session.impersonation.grant")
| where OriginalOutcomeResult == "SUCCESS"
| project PrivTime = TimeGenerated, ActorUsername, EventOriginalType, EventMessage, SrcIpAddr;
login_events
| join kind=inner priv_events on ActorUsername, SrcIpAddr
| where PrivTime between (LoginTime .. LoginTime + 15m)
| project
    LoginTime,
    PrivTime,
    ActorUsername,
    SrcIpAddr,
    SrcGeoCountry,
    SrcGeoCity,
    PrivilegeAction = EventOriginalType,
    ActionMessage = EventMessage
| extend
    TimeGenerated = LoginTime,
    AccountUpn = ActorUsername,
    ReportId = tostring(hash_sha256(strcat(tostring(LoginTime), ActorUsername, SrcIpAddr)))

alertTemplate.title: PoCaaS Stage 4 - Okta privilege escalation after suspicious login
alertTemplate.description: An Okta user logged in from a non-US location and performed a privilege escalation action within 15 minutes. Stage 4 of the PoCaaS attack chain (T1078.004, T1098).
